text: Justin Duff (born 10 May 1988) is a Canadian volleyball player, a member of Canada men's national volleyball team and Polish club Espadon Szczecin, a bronze medalist of NORCECA Championship (2011, 2013). In July 2016, he was named to Canada's 2016 Olympic team. ==Career== ===Clubs=== In 2014 he signed a contract with Transfer Bydgoszcz.Wolański i Duff zagrają w Bydgoszczy - przegladsportowy.pl - 20-05-2014 After one season in Portuguese club Benfica Lisbon and one season in Greek Olympiacos Piraeus, he decided to come back to Poland and join Espadon Szczecin team. ==Sporting achievements== ===Club=== ====National championships==== * 2010/2011 16px Austiran Championship, with Aon hotVolleys Vienna * 2011/2012 16px Turkish Championship, with Arkas Izmir * 2012/2013 16px Turkish Championship, with Arkas Izmir * 2012/2013 16px Russian Championship, with Belogorie Belgorod * 2016/2017 16px Greek Cup, with Olympiacos Piraeus ===National Team=== * 2011 16px Pan American Cup * 2011 16px NORCECA Championship * 2013 16px NORCECA Championship * 2015 16px NORCECA Championship ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:Canadian men's volleyball players Category:Olympiacos S.C. players Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Poland Category:Canadian expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Łuczniczka Bydgoszcz players Category:Canadian expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate volleyball players in Greece Category:Canadian expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Volleyball players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic volleyball players of Canada
title: Justin Duff
